subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text: Derivation unknown. May be alteration of ''futokoro'', or ''futokoro'' may be alteration of ''futsukuro''.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ふつくろ}}

# the [[bosom]], the [[breast]]
# a [[breast]] [[pocket]], particularly the [[pocket]]-like [[space]] within the front of a [[着物#Japanese|kimono]] above the [[帯#Japanese|obi]]
#* {{RQ:Shin'yaku Kegonkyō Ongi Shiki|92}}
#*: 心懐残忍 残謂多所殺戮也 今謂忍於殺戮 故云残忍也 心懐合云也 又下'''布都久呂''' 残害也 [...]
# a [[surrounded]] place, such as [[deep]] in the [[mountain]]s
# one's [[purse]]
# one's [[mind]]

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text: Derivation unknown. May be alteration of ''futsukuro'', or ''futsukuro'' may be alteration of ''futokoro''.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ふところ}}

# the [[bosom]], the [[breast]]
# a [[breast]] [[pocket]], particularly the [[pocket]]-like [[space]] within the front of a [[着物#Japanese|kimono]] above the [[帯#Japanese|obi]]
# a [[surrounded]] place, such as [[deep]] in the [[mountain]]s
# one's [[purse]]
# one's [[mind]]
